title: Is the National Science day Exhibition fun??
content: So today, we freshers are said ki that we have science exhibition and attendance will be taken.....I am sick like f rn.....should I go and check it out......will it be worth??? Seniors please help ASAP!!

comments.body: Where will the attendance be added??
I have no f idea....thats wt the CR's got in their mail...saying the attendance will be taken and noted down...
